thread.title: Empowering new project urges moms to get in the picture
thread.title_full: Empowering new project urges moms to get in the picture

author: Melissa Willets
title: Empowering new project urges moms to get in the picture
text:
by Melissa Willets posted in Mom Stories I just returned from vacation, and looking through my photos, I couldn't help but notice that, well, it looks like I wasn't even there. Because all the pictures are of my kids, and my hubby. I'm pretty sure many moms can relate to being absent from family photos.... Read more Â»

Want to get the full story? Click on the headline above. And thanks for reading the BabyCenter Blog.
